messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] pocket pool
messages.msgSnippet: ... that. ... his ... My 9yo son is often found with his hands in his pants, either at the waistband or the pockets. My husband says to him NO PLAYING POCKET
messages.messageBody:
<tuckervill@...> wrote:

> In a message dated 10/30/2002 11:20:27 AM Central Standard Time,
> mummyone24@... writes:
>
> > Someone suggested to try and change the compulsion to another
> > body part, like his earlobe. He just laughed at me when I suggested
that.
> > We
> > are still working on a solution together. By the way, he's almost 8.
> >
>
> Maybe you should just dress him in baggy pants and enocurage him to keep
his
> hands in his pockets. Decorum will win out eventually.
>
> Tuck


My 9yo son is often found with his hands in his pants, either at the
waistband or the pockets.
My husband says to him NO PLAYING POCKET POOL. <g> (he thinks it's funny :-)

Karin
